name: Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from your hand], choose a grade 0 card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit and all of your units with the [overDress] ability get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Blaze Maiden, Reiyu
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Vairina", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power] +2000.

name: Blaze Maiden, Rino
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Blaze Maiden, Reiyu", search your deck for up to one "Trickstar", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle that this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power] +2000.

name: Sunrise Egg
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Fire Slash Dragon, Inferno Sword
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power] +2000.

name: Vairina
effect:
[overDress]-"Trickstar" (You may place it by stacking it on the specified unit instead of normal calling it to (RC))
[AUTO](RC):When this unit in the [overDress] state attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. Then, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Escort Stealth Dragon, Hayashi Kaze
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Trickstar
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.

name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
effect:
(You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)
Additional Effect - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn!

name: Blaze Maiden, Zonne
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] Trigger +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)

name: Blaze Staff Monk, Cho Kuu Sha
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)

name: Blaze Fist Monk, Nikko
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)

name: Blaze Maiden, Rona
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)

name: Sunburst Evolution
effect:
Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!
Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Choose a "Vairina" from your drop, and put it into your hand.
